message: I cannot thank you guys enough:)
I cant believe this exists. What an amazing tool for civilization.
Ha! Thanks for this topic @11185d glad you like convore
@11185d So, we need to all spread the word so convore can really take off.
Convore is awesome.  Don't take the 30+ feature requests as anything other than love.
@rcs I am trying to spread the word but people are put off by the facebook warning. either that or they don't want yet another account to login to or inbox to check.
Impressive that 172 of the 300 CodeConf attendees (plus or minus) are using Convore to follow the conference.
It's official convore is the next big thing: http://dryerasegirl.com/?text=+convore+is+the+next+big+thing%21

Having grown accustomed to frustrating lag when using Twitter apps, etc. on my crusty old iPhone 3G, I am consistently impressed with how snappy the Convore app is. It updates so fast I think it hasn't done anything because I'm so used to watching interfaces chug along as stuff loads from the network. It's so nice to use an app written by people who know how to code things efficiently.
